name: Village (Mae)
description:
You are stuck in a time loop where you repeat the same day over and over again. Find all the pieces of treasure around the village to escape!

Made for Ludum Dare 47 and Weekly Game Jam 169.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • Space to interact
  • R to restart game
  • Escape to exit game (Windows only)

Timelapse

Credits

  • Game made using GameMaker: Studio 2
  • Graphics made using Aseprite
  • Fun Adventure BGM by Hitctrl (https://soundcloud.com/hitctrl)
  • Retro Gaming font by Daymarius (https://www.dafont.com/retro-gaming.font)
